@alisidd @AshishBora Here is an update on the design. As @AshishBora suggested, to create what I call a "context graph", we use the context_graph_scope scope. The scope creates the pseudo graph and temporarily replaces the original graph's create_op function with one that in addition to everything create_op did, mutates the op and inserts it in the context_graph.

https://github.com/siryog90/tensorflow/commit/f8ee067129c9dcbadd629040114980ee28404e14

Thoughts?
